name: Tap N Twist 3 - Free
description:
**********************************************************
Tap, Twist and Match! Brace yourself for the best Match-3 game to hit the App Store. Be Warned: Extremely Addictive!
*********************************************************

Get ready to play the most unique Match-3 game in the App Store. Experience the new game play of twisting and matching. It is a Match-3 with a twist literally!

It comes with a set of features that makes it more rewarding, fun and addictive. Tap N Twist 3 is powered by one of the most advanced Match-3 game engines in the industry. Unlike many other match-3 games it is capable of identifying matches of 6,7 or even 8 gems in a row. Now match 3,4,5,6,7,8 gems in a row and creates power gems and get rewarded.

Tap N Twist 3 comes with four game modes to cater for every gamer’s needs.
- Classic mode: Standard game mode with increasing difficulty, allowing you to progress through different levels, with many obstacles such as bombs and locks.
- Timed mode: A five minutes game challenge version of the classic mode.
- Forever mode: A stress free game mode without bombs and locks.
- Novel mode: The new game mode with unique game playing style and challenge.

It also comes with Score Multiplier, a new feature that will greatly enhance Match-3 experience. Each consecutive matching twist you make will add to a chain. As the chain grows longer, the Multiplier Progress Bar fills up. Each time you fill the Multiplier Progress bar, the Score Multiplier increments upwards, multiplying all your points by the Multiplier. For every Multiplier Progress Bar fills up after 10x you will receive a bonus power gem.

Features:
- Four game modes: Classic, Timed, Forever and Novel
- Score Multiplier and bonus gems
- Ability to save and load games
- Capable of identifying matches of 3,4,5,6,7,8 gems in a row, vertically or horizontally
- 20 achievements to be achieved (830 OpenFeint points)
- Support OpenFeint 2.4 (Leaderboards, Achievements, Chat and more)
- Listen to the game soundtrack or disable it and use your own iPod music
